description: Translate only rows with an NFL value in co_ter. Note in QC03 there are some non-NFL co_ter values. Note that none of these rows include LYR info so each polygon is either LYR or NFL.
Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Maps source codes to CASFRI codes. Report value of 16 as UNUSED_VALUE.
No horizontal structure so structure_per should always be 100

Uses the qc_standstructure_lookup table to find number of lyr layers, then tests to see if nfl is present and counts the total number of layers. Returns layers number based on the layer being translated.
Maps source value to NAT_NON_VEG using list of values
Maps source value to NON_FOR_ANTH using list of values.
Maps source value to NON_FOR_VEG using list of values.
